external_references.description: Jen Miller-Osborn and Mike Harbison. (2019, December 17). Rancor: Cyber Espionage Group Uses New Custom Malware to Attack Southeast Asia. Retrieved February 9, 2024.

description: [Rancor](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0075) has complied VBScript-generated MOF files into WMI event subscriptions for persistence.(Citation: Rancor WMI)
